Description: When user moves from one UI item to another
Sound Designer Notes: I provided a sound that resembles footsteps moving from one area to another

Description: When user opens a sub menu
Game Designer Notes: Each submenu is shown as a "bag", so something that reads like a bag being opened
Sound Designer Notes: I provided a sound that resembles a bag being clicked open

Description: When user exits a sub menu
Sound Designer Notes: I provided a sound that resembles a bag being snapped closed

Description: When user selects an item for gameplay
Sound Designer Notes: I provided a sound that resembles the sound of an item moving swiftly up
I provided a sound that resembles the sound of an item moving swiftly down

Description: General purpose error sound. Played when user tries to exit a top level submenu, equip a deactivated item, etc
Sound Designer Notes: I provided a sound that resembles a click
